channel.title: Plz help me with my shop problems
channel.description:
ok i really need help with my shop i dont have a limit for the amount of shops cause i have fixed the problem there so i have 301 shops and i have added them correctly in the Wanneshop area i have addeed them correctly in autospawn and shop but when i talk to the npc nothing happens and if i trade the npc it disconnects me its starting to get on my nerves not being able to have extra shop in my server cause i wanna add some new shops but it wont work for me grr... so if u can help me plz help i will be extreamly apreciated for any help possible this is what is in my runserver.bat
Starting Only The Best Server on 0.0.0.0:10102 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1866 Client type: low memory version UserId: 40786811 spoonkitty is signing onto server. Did not save for spoonkitty ClientHandler: Client spoonkitty disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1867 Client type: low memory version UserId: 40786811 spoonkitty is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-spoonkitty]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atNPC 1: 2599 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atObject: 2890,3508 objectID: 1747 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atNPC 1: 2591 [b]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -12 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18649) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17588) at client.process(client.java:17558) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Ultimate PK Server [fatal] - exception[/b] Game saved for player spoonkitty ClientHandler: Client spoonkitty disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1873 Client type: low memory version UserId: 40786811 spoonkitty is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-spoonkitty]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-spoonkitty]: Auto saved game. [client-1-spoonkitty]: Auto saving moreinfo file... [client-1-spoonkitty]: Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file. Press any key to continue . . .
i have put it in quote for every1 to read it easier ok what i have put above in bold i have located in the files and these are the lines the errors are in: Client.java [b]line 18649:[/b] [code] NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;[/code] [b]line 17588:[/b] [code] parseIncomingPackets(); [/code] [b]line 17558:[/b] [code] return packetProcess();[/code] PlayerHandler.java [b]line 137:[/b] [code] while(players[i].process());[/code] Server.java: line 50: [code] playerHandler.process();[/code] and what does this mean? [code][client-1-spoonkitty]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atNPC 1: 2599 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atObject: 2890,3508 objectID: 1747 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atNPC 1: 2591[/code]

( cheaper then buying staff )[/quote]kk lol but i would rather npc’s

would any1 no a way to fix the prob with the npc’s

plz somebody help me

item.title: Plz help me with my shop problems
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

ok i really need help with my shop i dont have a limit for the amount of shops cause i have fixed the problem there so i have 301 shops and i have added them correctly in the Wanneshop area i have addeed them correctly in autospawn and shop but when i talk to the npc nothing happens and if i trade the npc it disconnects me its starting to get on my nerves not being able to have extra shop in my server cause i wanna add some new shops but it wont work for me grr… so if u can help me plz help i will be extreamly apreciated for any help possible

this is what is in my runserver.bat

Starting Only The Best Server on 0.0.0.0:10102 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1866 Client type: low memory version UserId: 40786811 spoonkitty is signing onto server. Did not save for spoonkitty ClientHandler: Client spoonkitty disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1867 Client type: low memory version UserId: 40786811 spoonkitty is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-spoonkitty]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atNPC 1: 2599 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atObject: 2890,3508 objectID: 1747 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atNPC 1: 2591 [b]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -12 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18649) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17588) at client.process(client.java:17558) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Ultimate PK Server [fatal] - exception[/b] Game saved for player spoonkitty ClientHandler: Client spoonkitty disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1873 Client type: low memory version UserId: 40786811 spoonkitty is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-spoonkitty]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-spoonkitty]: Auto saved game. [client-1-spoonkitty]: Auto saving moreinfo file... [client-1-spoonkitty]: Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file. Press any key to continue . . .

i have put it in quote for every1 to read it easier

ok what i have put above in bold i have located in the files and these are the lines the errors are in:

Client.java
line 18649:

				NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;

line 17588:

			parseIncomingPackets();

line 17558:

		return packetProcess();

PlayerHandler.java
line 137:

			while(players[i].process());

Server.java:
line 50:

			playerHandler.process();

and what does this mean?

[client-1-spoonkitty]: Case 130: 0 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atNPC 1: 2599 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atObject: 2890,3508 objectID: 1747 [client-1-spoonkitty]: atNPC 1: 2591
